noun.description: A person or animal who is asleep or who sleeps in a specified way.
examples: he was a light sleeper, for long periods an insomniac

noun.description: A movie, book, play, etc., that achieves sudden unexpected success after initially attracting little attention, typically one that proves popular without much promotion or expenditure.
A stocky fish with mottled coloration which occurs widely in warm seas and fresh water.
